Danger Close.name: Danger Close
Danger Close.description: Equip extra lethal and tactical equipment, and start with max ammo.

Law Breaker.name: Law Breaker
Law Breaker.description: Equip any weapon in either slot and equip any perks.

Gunfighter.name: Gunfighter
Gunfighter.description: Unlocks 3 additional attachment slots for your primary weapon.

Engineer.name: Engineer
Engineer.description: Detect enemy equipment and Scorestreaks through walls. See enemy Scorestreaks on your minimap. Re-roll Care Packages.

Paranoia.name: Paranoia
Paranoia.description: Hear an alert when an enemy aims at you. Your vision pulses if the enemy is outside of your view.

Flak Jacket.name: Flak Jacket
Flak Jacket.description: Take less damage from enemy explosives and Molotov and Combat Bow flames.

Tactical Mask.name: Tactical Mask
Tactical Mask.description: Maximized resistance to Flashbang and Stun Grenade. Immune to gas.

Forward Intel.name: Forward Intel
Forward Intel.description: See indicators for enemy reinforcements on your minimap. Minimap shows a larger area.

Assassin.name: Assassin
Assassin.description: Enemies on a Killstreak have a crosshair indicator on your minimap. Receive extra Score for taking them down.

Gearhead.name: Gearhead
Gearhead.description: Reduce Field Upgrade cooldown. Store up to two Field Upgrade charges.

Tracker.name: Tracker
Tracker.description: See imprint of enemy footsteps. Aim at enemies to reveal them on your team's minimap.

Gung-Ho.name: Gung-Ho
Gung-Ho.description: Fire your weapon and use Equipment while sprinting. Move at full speed when reloading. Switch weapons faster. Take less damage from falling. Fire more accurately while sliding.

Ghost.name: Ghost
Ghost.description: Undetectable by enemy Spy Planes whenever you are moving, planting or defusing bombs, or controlling Scorestreaks.

Cold Blooded.name: Cold Blooded
Cold Blooded.description: AI-controlled Scorestreaks will not target you, and player-controlled Scorestreaks will not highlight you. Show up cold on Thermal. Players in vehicles won't see your nameplate.

Ninja.name: Ninja
Ninja.description: Move more quietly. Speak only when necessary.

Spycraft.name: Spycraft
Spycraft.description: Hack enemy Field Upgrades. Immune to Counter Spy Plane, Jammer, Field Mic, Tracker, and Paranoia. Won't trigger Proximity Mines or Gas Mines. Booby trap enemy Care Packages.

Combat Bow.description: Arrows burn targets and the surrounding area.
Combat Bow.name: Combat Bow

Spy Plane.description: Reveal enemy positions through the Fog of War.
Spy Plane.name: Spy Plane

Counter-Spy Plane.description: Scramble enemy mini-maps and disabled hostile Missle Turrets for a short time.
Counter-Spy Plane.name: Counter-Spy Plane

Armor.description: Reduces incoming bullet damage. Destroyed after it absorbs too much damage.
Armor.name: Armor

Sentry Turret.description: Deploy a deadly automated turret that targets enemy players, vehicles, and equipment.
Sentry Turret.name: Sentry Turret

Care Package.description: Airdrop a random Scorestreak. Crate self-destructs after use.
Care Package.name: Care Package

Death Machine.description: Deadly machine gun with high damage rounds that suppress enemies in the line of fire.
Death Machine.name: Death Machine

Air Patrol.description: Call in a squadron of jets to attack enemy air Scorestreaks. Counter enemy Air Patrols.
Air Patrol.name: Air Patrol

Napalm Strike.description: Launch a targeted carpet bomb strike of explosive napalm.
Napalm Strike.name: Napalm Strike

Hand Cannon.description: Massive high-caliber revolver that fires devastating rounds with increased bullet penetration.
Hand Cannon.name: Hand Cannon

Artillery.description: Launch three targeted artillery strikes. Unused strikes can be saved for later.
Artillery.name: Artillery

Cruise Missile.description: Steer a trio of missiles with boost and air brake controls. Secondary missles auto-fire at painted targets.
Cruise Missile.name: Cruise Missile

Strafe Run.description: Twin strafing planes attack with heavy machine gun fire and air-to-air rockets.
Strafe Run.name: Strafe Run

H.A.R.P..description: High-Altitude Reconnaissance Plane that shows both enemy position and direction on the mini-map.
H.A.R.P..name: H.A.R.P.

VTOL Escort.description: Lay waste to enemy infantry and vehicles from the cockpit of a powerful VTOL jet.
VTOL Escort.name: VTOL Escort

Chopper Gunner.description: Be the gunner in a close air support helicopter.
Chopper Gunner.name: Chopper Gunner

Gunship.description: Be the gunner in a close air support gunship.
Gunship.name: Gunship
